context: Etsy, Inc. is a e-commerce marketplace for handmade and vintage goods focused on artisan marketplace, unique items, and creative entrepreneurship. Acquired Depop and Elo7. Marketplace diversification.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Dominant e-commerce with Handmade and third-party sellers

competitors.name: eBay
competitors.notes: Marketplace for vintage, collectibles, and unique items

competitors.name: Shopify
competitors.notes: Enabling independent sellers to build own stores

competitors.name: Poshmark
competitors.notes: Social commerce for fashion and home goods
